title: New champ idea - Tenoko Primary Role: Tank (jungle/support)
body:
This is just an idea so I don't mind if it doesn't get taken into thought or it does

Passive - Historic [ Enemy champions that stand around him in a medium radius are breifly slowed every 4 seconds]
Q - He sinks into the ground and reappears somewhere else in a small to medium radius damaging all enemies where he reappears and knocking up enemies in the centre of the impact range
W - Passive [He gains 5 armor and 5 magic resist per 1000 health]  Active - He gains a shield which strengthens depending on the damage he has taken in the past 5 seconds
E - Upon activation his next autoattack in the next 6 seconds deals aoe (area of effect) damage and stuns all targets around him for 1.5 seconds and gives him attack speed
R - He calls upon the might of the Shuriman empire to give a targeted teammate increased health and mana regeneration while sorrounding champs get 5% more ap (ability power) and ad (attack damage)
